mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS( SELECT at_login FROM attendance WHERE at_num = ${user_num} AND date_format(at_login, '%Y-%m-%d' )= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d' ) )AS flag
SELECT date_format(at_login, '%Y-%m-%d' )as at_login FROM attendance WHERE at_num = ${user_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_num = ${user_num} and user_password = ${user_password}
SELECT count(*) FROM attendance WHERE at_num = ${user_num}
SELECT user_profile FROM user WHERE user_num=${user_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM review_board WHERE re_num = ${user_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM album_board WHERE al_user_num = ${user_num}
SELECT count(*) FROM share_board WHERE sh_num = ${user_num}

SELECT s.sh_seq as seq, sh_num as user_num, sh_subject as subject, sh_hashtag as hash_tag, sh_hit as hit, date_format(sh_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff( now(), sh_date ) wgap, user_nickname, count(c.sh_seq) cmt_cnt FROM share_board s LEFT OUTER JOIN user ON sh_num = user_num LEFT OUTER JOIN share_board_comment c ON s.sh_seq = c.sh_seq WHERE sh_num = #{user_num} AND s.sh_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hash_tag}, '%') GROUP BY s.sh_seq, c.sh_seq ORDER BY s.sh_date desc, s.sh_seq desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM share_board WHERE sh_num = #{user_num} AND sh_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hashTag}, '%')
